thread.title: 15 Awesome Purchases That Support Your Rights
thread.title_full: 15 Awesome Purchases That Support Your Rights

author: Nora Whelan
title: 15 Awesome Purchases That Support Your Rights
text:
View this image ›
etsy.com All profits from the sale of these truth-telling pins (a collaboration with artist India K ) will go to the ACLU.
Get one here .
ID: 10066337 2. Letter for Good First Amendment Watercolor Card Set, $15 View this image ›
etsy.com 100% of proceeds from these very relevant cards (five per set) will go to the ACLU.
Get them here .
ID: 10067032 3. BungalowBoo Rosie the Riveter Personalized Cutting Board, $17+ View this image ›
etsy.com Give your favorite foodie friend this badass cutting board with their name on it, and 100% of proceeds will be sent to the ACLU. Win/win.
Get it here .
ID: 10067043 4. Make LA Design “The Revolution” Print, $22 View this image ›
etsy.com 100% of proceeds from this Susan B. Anthony and Elizabeth Cady Stanton-quoting print will go to either the ACLU or Planned Parenthood [insert “pro-choice” pun here].
Get it here .
ID: 10067117 5. Hannah K “Hate Is Not Healthy” Pin, $1 View this image ›
etsy.com 100% of proceeds from these buttons go to the ACLU — and they’re so affordable, you can get some for your friends too!
Get it here .
ID: 10067293 6. Popular Mercantile “In Lieu of my Pantsuit” Tee, $28 View this image ›
etsy.com $3 from each sale of this snuggly unisex tee will go to the ACLU.
Get it here .
ID: 10067174 7. Dexterity Press ACLU Benefit Print, $50 View this image ›
etsy.com Proceeds from this gorgeous multi-impression letterpress print will go to the ACLU.
Get it here .
ID: 10066850 8. Stitches Be Krazy “Nasty Woman” Cross Stitch Christmas Ornament, $25 View this image ›
etsy.com 20% of each sale will go to the ACLU, because as the listing notes, “we’re going to need them.”
Get it here .
ID: 10067184 9. ArsFauna Rooster Print, $22 View this image ›
etsy.com 25% of proceeds from this gorgeous hand-drawn print will go to the ACLU.
Get it here .
ID: 10066362 10. Holly Blue Prevail Earrings, $46 View this image ›
etsy.com $10 from each pair of these earrings, “Inspired by the classic symbol to represent [their maker’s] hope of living in a society where all can live free of harassment and discrimination,” will go to the ACLU.
Get them here .
ID: 10066329 11. Debbie Fong “The Garden” Mini Prints Set, $15 View this image ›
etsy.com 100% of proceeds from these cuties will benefit the ACLU.
Get them here .
ID: 10066379 12. City Girl Totes Safety Pin Bag, $19.99 View this image ›
etsy.com $5 from each of these bags goes to the ACLU, taking the safety pin from a well-meaning symbol to a vehicle for concrete change.
Get it here .
ID: 10067302 13. WhyNotSara “Love Trumps Hate” Cross Stitch, $20 View this image ›
etsy.com 100% of proceeds from this cute ‘n’ true cross stitch will go to the ACLU.
Get it here .
ID: 10067170 14. Suburban Avenger “Not My President” Print, $20 View this image ›
etsy.com 75% of proceeds from this Toni Morrison -inspired print are headed to the ACLU.
Get it here .
ID: 10067053 15. Isabella and Max “Liberty and Justice” Bangle, $120 View this image ›
etsy.com The two circles (representing liberty and justice) that make up this bracelet, “are strongest at the intersection where they come together,” according to its listing. 100% of proceeds are headed to the ACLU.
Get it here .
ID: 10066349 16. ID: 10080953 17. ID: 10080965 18. ID: 10080971
